A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Basically\, I loved the movie as the next in the series following Force Awakens and leading to whatever the future is... I’m not sure I love the connection (or lack of) to the original 6 movies. I can’t determine if they are wanting to get us off of the “Skywalker Bloodline” story (which the first 6 movies were all about)... or if they will surprise us in the next movie. They have certainly set this up to go in it’s own new direction or surprise us with a past connection. I do think it was too much like Empire to be original and the gap explaining how the Empire regained power has never been explained. With Darth Vader and the Emperor dying in VI\, how did they gain full galactic power again or so quickly?
